name: ProQuest Safari Books Online - Readable Blue
description:
Makes "ProQuest Safari Books Online" sites easier to read:
* soothing blue background with navy blue foreground
* line spacing and hanging indentation for paragraphs
* 80-character maximum width to limit very long lines
* readable font size in overview, table of contents, etc.
additional_info:
2019-05-19: Embolden code spans in prose.  Ensure that monospaced font is used for code listings.
2018-11-04: Enlarge font in left-side panel (mini Table of Contents). Apply line spacing to list items.
2018-10-11: Unobtrusive styling for next/previous buttons that run along the sides of the full page view.
2018-10-10: Enlarge font in Table of Contents.  Don't indent first paragraph.  Embolden definition terms.
